speech: Leaf blast chawal ke patton ki ek aam bimari hai jo fungus ki wajah se hoti hai.
Yeh bimari zyadatar humid aur garm mausam mein failti hai.
Symptoms mein patton par triangular brown ya gray spots aana shamil hai.
Agar yeh bimari barh jaye to yeh chawal ke yield ko kaafi kam kar sakti hai.
Is bimari ko rokne ke liye resistant chawal varieties lagayen aur fields ka pani theek se manage karein.
Fungicides ka istemal karna is bimari ke liye ek acha ilaj hai.

data.text: Leaf blast ke symptoms kya hain?
Leaf blast ka ilaj kaise karein?
Leaf blast se kaise bacha jaaye?
Leaf blast chawal ke yield ko kaise affect karta hai?
